K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:60b-1: a'arya da sha dika aandha k'a ra bi dha na sa na n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:60b-3: 'phags pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:60b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:60b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:60b-7: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya rnams kyi nang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:60b-8: ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:60b-10: 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' 'khor chen po ngang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:60b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:60b-15: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:60b-16: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61a-0: de'i tshe na sh'akya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal zhes bya ba zhig bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shing rta la zhon nas ser skya'i gnas grong khyer chen po nas @61a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61a-2: sh'akya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61a-3: bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho na nas gshegs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61a-4: mthong nas kyang shing rta de las babs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61a-5: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61a-6: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61a-8: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61a-9: thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das la sh'akya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61a-12: 'di na bdag gi pha ma gnyis gnyid log pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61a-13: ma log pa dag la mi ma lags pa rnams rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61a-15: bdag kyang gang gi tshe ljongs kyi phyogs gzhan du mchi ba'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61a-16: bdag la'ang chom rkun pa dag rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61a-17: gcan zan dag kyang rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61a-18: de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du ci nas kyang bdag la mi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61b-0: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa 'ga' yang rnam par 'tshe bar mi @61b bgyid pa de ltar bdag la legs par bsrung ba mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61b-1: bsrung ba'i cho ga'ang bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61b-2: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis sh'akya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61b-5: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61b-7: de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61b-8: sh'akya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61b-11: shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams nyon mongs pa thams cad bskyod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61b-12: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes spyod ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61b-14: khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shar phyogs su 'gro na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61b-15: de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61b-16: sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing song na khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:61b-17: de'i tshe ma g-yengs par de yid la byas na khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62a-1: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62a-2: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thub pa che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62a-3: rje la rab tu phyag btsal te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62a-4: rtag tu de na mngon byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62a-7: lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu khri 'das pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams mun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62a-9: mun nag gi tshogs bcom pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62a-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems dang po bskyed pa yid la mdzad pa rnam grangs bsnyengs pa dang; bag tsha ba dang bral bas mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62a-12: khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir lho phyogs su 'gro na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62a-13: de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag btsal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62a-14: sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62a-15: khyim la sogs pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnam par ma g-yengs pa yid la byed pas song na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62a-16: khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62a-17: khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62a-19: khyim gyi bsam pa rnams dang ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62a-20: kun nas ldang ba kun bral zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62b-0: @62b lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62b-3: nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yul phebs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62b-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kho na dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62b-5: rgyags pa rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62b-7: khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir nub phyogs su 'gro na de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag btsal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas nas sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing zag pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62b-8: rnam par ma g-yengs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62b-9: dran pas khyod song na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62b-11: chos 'ga' skyes pa yod min zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62b-12: 'ga' yang 'gag par mi 'gyur te; ;gang gis chos rnams de ltar shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62b-13: de la 'jigs pa ci yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:62b-15: byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63a-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen @63a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63a-1: gzugs bkod 'od gnon zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63a-3: khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir byang phyogs su 'gro na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63a-4: de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag btsal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63a-5: sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma g-yengs par yid la byed pas song na; khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63a-6: khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63a-8: rtag tu sems can thams cad la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63a-9: mnyam pa nyid kyi sems byos la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63a-10: sems can de lam brnyas dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63a-13: byang shar gyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bdud kyi sde bcom pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63a-14: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63a-15: yid gnyis kun 'joms rnam gnon zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63b-0: bdad @63b kyi ris kyi lha ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63b-2: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa'i skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63b-4: khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir byang shar gyi phyogs su 'gro na de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag btsal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63b-5: sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma yengs pas song na khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63b-6: khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63b-8: gang gis dang po'i thugs kyis ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63b-9: bdud rnams pham mdzad sangs rgyas de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63b-10: dran bzhin du ni khyod song na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63b-13: shar lho'i phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:63b-14: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems dang po bskyed pas phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64a-1: des dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64a-2: sangs rgyas pa nyid kyi bar du bar chad med par sbyin pa byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64a-9: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de'i skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64a-11: khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shar lho'i phyogs su 'gro na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64a-12: de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la yan lag lngas phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64a-13: phyis khyim nas song zhig dang; khyod la phyis 'gyod pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64a-14: 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64a-15: rnam par ma g-yengs pas yid la byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64a-16: khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64a-18: yan lag lngas ni phyag btsal te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64a-19: phyi nas khyim nas song zhig dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64a-20: chom rkun rnams kyis khyod kun tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64a-23: lho nub kyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas g-yogs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64b-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gdugs @64b 'phags snang zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64b-2: khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir lho nub kyi phyogs su 'gro na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64b-3: de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag btsal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64b-4: sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma g-yengs pa'i yid la byed pas song na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64b-6: rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag btsal nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64b-7: me tog sil mas gtor cig dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64b-8: khyod ni lho nub 'gro ba na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64b-11: nub byang gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams yongs dag rab gnas mngon par 'phags zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64b-13: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni mi gtsang ba med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:64b-21: snyigs ma lnga med pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65a-1: tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir nub byang gi phyogs su 'gro na tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par blangs nas phyis khyim nas rnam par ma g-yengs pa'i yid la byed pas song zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65a-3: khyed bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65a-5: tshangs spyod yang dag blangs byas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65a-6: phyi nas khyim nas song zhig dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65a-7: khyod ni gang dang gar 'gro yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65a-8: chom rkun rnams kyis zil mi non; ;gzhon nu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65a-9: steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dmigs pa med pa yid la byed pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65a-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skrag med mun bral ting nge 'dzin mngon 'phags rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65a-12: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag btsal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te 'dug kyang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65a-14: sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas shing gnas na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis @65b de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65b-1: khyod kyis ma yengs yid byed kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65b-2: rtag tu rgyal ba de dran zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65b-3: rtag tu byams pa'i sems byos dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65b-6: 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu khri nyis stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65b-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang po sems bskyed the tshom gcod mdzad nyon mongs bskyod ces bya ba de ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65b-9: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bya ba rtsom pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65b-13: spyod lam thams cad du phyag 'tshol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65b-15: sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65b-16: phan pa'i sems sgrubs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65b-18: khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65b-19: dgos pa thams cad kyang 'bad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65b-21: bya ba kun la nyin mtshan du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65b-22: sangs rgyas de ni dran bya zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:65b-23: byang chub sems kyang ma gtang dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66a-0: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra @66a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66a-1: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan legs par bzung bar bgyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66a-2: legs par bcad bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66a-3: legs par kun chub par gyis shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66a-6: spu zing zhes byed pa gang ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad khyod la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66a-7: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang; bcom ldan 'das la sh'akya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66a-9: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan rnams bzung lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66a-11: bdag la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mun pa ma mchis shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66a-13: bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar 'khor rnams la chos ston pa bzhin du mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66a-17: de nas 'khor de las sh'akya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal la sogs pa skye bo phal po che'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das la ba lta ba dang; phyag 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-0: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i srog chags stong tshang ba de dag thams cad @66b stan las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-1: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-2: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-3: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-5: bdag cag gis don gyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-7: bdag cag la phyogs de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang mun pa ma mchis par gda' la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-10: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-13: da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa 'di bzhin du gda'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-14: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu stan las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-15: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-16: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-17: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btug nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-18: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-21: rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan rnams thos nas mig rnam par dag cing phyogs bcu dag na 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag mchis pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:66b-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong ba de dag gi mig rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams de dag //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67a-1: tshe rabs gzhan du tshe 'phos na'ang 'bral bar 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67a-6: rigs kyi bu mo gang dag 'di ltar mig rnam par dag pa de dag ni sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67a-8: khyod kyis srog chags stong tshangs ba 'di mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67a-10: 'di dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan bzung pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis re res kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag byed du bcug nas srid pa tha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67a-11: lus tha ma la byang chub kyi chogs thams cad rdzogs par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67a-12: bskal pa gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan dag pas brgyan pa zhes bya bar mtshan mthun pa sha stag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de rnams lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di bka' stsal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67b-7: kun tu rab tu chem chem /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67b-11: sa bla'i lha rnams kyis kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67b-13: 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bzung ba tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bzung zhing chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas don thams cad thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar che ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67b-14: su zhig sangs rgyas la dad par mi 'gyur zhes sgra bsgrags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67b-15: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67b-16: sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67b-20: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67b-22: tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:67b-23: tshangs pa chen po rnams nas 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar gyis sa bla'i lha rnams kyi sgra de thos nas yi rangs shing rab tu dga' la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68a-0: 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bzung ba tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bzung zhing chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas don thams @68a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68a-1: cad thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar che ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68a-2: su zhig sangs rgyas la dad par mi 'gyur zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68a-6: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68a-10: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68a-11: than glegs bam la bris te 'chang bar byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68a-13: rigs kyi bu mo de dag sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68a-14: sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin par rig par bya'o; ;de dag la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68a-15: de dag shis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68a-16: de dag pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68a-20: mtshon gyis 'jigs pa mi 'byung par yid ches par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68b-0: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsrung ba lung bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di shes nas chos kyi rnam srangs 'di gzung ba'i phyir lha'i bu stong tshang bas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga @68b ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68b-2: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68b-4: srog chags stong tshang ba gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag la lha'i tsandan gyi phye ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68b-5: lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba dang; mand'a ra ba chen po rnams kyis mngon par gtor nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68b-8: rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68b-11: kun chub par bgyid pa de dag bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68b-14: rigs kyi bu mo de dag khyim na mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68b-17: khyim stong pa na mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68b-18: 'brog dgon pa na mchis sam; lam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68b-19: lam gol ba na mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68b-21: gnyid ma log pa dag na'ang de dag la pha rol gyi gnod pas 'gum par mi 'gyur bar bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:68b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-0: da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs @69a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-1: te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-2: rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du chos gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-6: sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-8: de tsam gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti byas par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-11: mchod pa byas par mi 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-13: rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin par byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-17: gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-18: tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-20: de tsam gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti bya ba dam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-21: bla mar bya ba dam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-22: ri mor bya ba dam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-23: mchod pa dam pas bkur sti byas pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-26: mchod pa byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-27: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-28: bla gos phrag pa cig tu byas nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69a-29: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-0: @69b chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-2: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun tu dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-5: de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-6: 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba dang dngos po med par rtogs pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-7: mtshan nyid med par rtogs pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-9: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-10: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-11: sh'akya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-12: srog chags stong tshang ba de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-13: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-15: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-19: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-21: 'phags pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-22: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shuddha sing ha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-23: lo tstsha ba bande rtsangs de bendra rakshi tas bsgyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-004:69b-24: zhus chen gyi lotstsha ba bande klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis zhus chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa //
